Were you a Lego set kid or a giant-bucket-of-Legos kid? I was a sets kid all the way — I loved, and still love, the zen feeling of building something incredible a little bit at a time. (Also, everything I tried to build from the giant bucket was an insurance-fraud deathtrap, but let's not dwell on that). This year we're on the hunt for the best [Black Friday](https://www.engadget.com/deals/black-friday-2025-deals-the-biggest-sales-from-amazon-apple-lego-ninja-dyson-and-others-to-start-shopping-now-100052409.html) deals on Lego sets — from your favorite universes like Harry Potter, Disney and Star Wars to real-world architectural behemoths. If you've had your eye on a set but you've been waiting because of the price, this list is for you.

It's a good idea to use a [price tracker](https://camelcamelcamel.com/) to see if you're getting the best Black Friday Lego deals. You'll find Lego bargains this holiday season at retailers like [Amazon](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL3M_&signature=AQAAAWuKMcAAurSWO8qBXo-P0E9v-yEHTM1oQ3zEQIkMkADP&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fs%3Fk%3Dlego%26rh%3Dp_n_deal_type%253A23566065011) and [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&_cG92aWQ9RVRTX0QwN19WU0JfQnVpbGRpbmdTZXRzX1ZGX0JSTkRfU1JDSC1MRUdPU2VhcmNoX0xFR09CcmFuZFNob3AifQ&signature=AQAAAdwPsGweZwvDenAHQHxCAQWT1upABTu39LrKo37hXqan&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fbrand%2Flego%2F10030096%3Fpovid%3DETS_D07_VSB_BuildingSets_VF_BRND_SRCH-LEGOSearch_LEGOBrandShop), but don't overlook [Lego's own site](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Lego%27s+own+site&&signature=AQAAAaU4kmNkt-R-vq0q8OYFvVhNpzh7oDicxOUmH1u3S51i&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fcategories%2Fsales-and-deals). If you join the free [Lego Insiders](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Lego+Insiders&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5sZWdvLmNvbS9lbi11cy9pbnNpZGVycyIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiMDQ5NjFkMmItMTFjNy00NmVlLWFkOTgtMDJjNThlNWNkM2FlIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5sZWdvLmNvbS9lbi11cy9pbnNpZGVycyJ9&signature=AQAAAZRfwWYilXr2qk-TA5iU_l3-6c1ZI-XA3Le1Eag1rP2M&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Finsiders) program, you'll get special discounts and exclusive member gifts with each purchase, plus points you can redeem for your next set or bucket.

We're also waiting with bated breath for the hottest Lego gift of the season, the [Star Trek USS Enterprise set](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Star+Trek+USS+Enterprise+set&&signature=AQAAARUtc9wUgmXIWwHjv3QmTF6WAd-Q_B4XT65oFUNHyfZZ&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fstar-trek-u-s-s-enterprise-ncc-1701-d-10356), which was [just announced](https://www.engadget.com/entertainment/legos-star-trek-uss-enterprise-set-arrives-on-black-friday-173414532.html). With a titanic 3,600 pieces and mini-figures of the whole Next Generation crew (Guinan is a standout), it will be a must-have for any Star Trek fans. The set will be available for $400 starting November 28.
